name: Don't Screw This Up
description:
[ So here it's my submission to the ONE MINUTE JAM hosted by farsidevirtual ]

_________________________________________________________________________________________
---------------------------------------ABOUT-THE-GAME-------------------------------------

Don't Screw This Up is a litlle point and click where you must fail your job interview to win. Every time you start a new game, you apply for a new job.

The rule of the jam was to create a game in which the gameplay lasts no more than a minute and all that without the use of a countdown timer if possible.

At the moment only three levels are available due to the time I had to make the game and the fact that this is my first game created on renpy but, if you liked the concept, follow my Itchio page, there will be updates soon ! --> Leffy21

_________________________________________________________________________________________
-------------------------------------------CREDITS----------------------------------------------

In order to be able to create this game, I used some free assets found on Itchio :
--> Angel Seraphim - RenPy Achievements
--> DOS88 - DOS-88 Synthwave Music Library
--> Cosmin Mirza - Royalty Free Game Music Vol. 1
--> Machaon maackii - Spooky character sprites for visual novel
--> Sraye - Lisette - Visual Novel Sprite
(For everything else I used Google and Gimp !)
